title: The Writer's Almanac for Sunday, May 15, 2022
description: “Pay no attention to that man behind the curtain.” Words written by the man behind “The Wizard of Oz, L. Frank Baum, born this day in 1856.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “Pay no attention to that man behind the curtain.” Words written by the man behind “The Wizard of Oz, L. Frank Baum, born this day in 1856.
